product_name: MUK LUKS Visor Beanie with Fur Neck Wrap - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: The MUK LUKS visor beanie with fur neck wrap lets you bundle up in cold weather and stay cozy without giving up your put-together style. Hat features acrylic knit fabric for lightweight warmth and soft texture; visor shields eyes from sun and light precipitation. Acrylic knit scarf features a faux-fur lining for a luxurious look and next-to-skin softness. Closeout.
short_description: The MUK LUKS visor beanie with fur neck wrap lets you bundle up in cold weather and stay cozy without giving up your put-together style.
